doc:
Ted Billings https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Billings 0 Ted Billings (April 7, 1880 – July 5, 1947) was an American character actor of the silent and sound film eras. Born in London, England on April 7, 1880, Billings made his film debut in the role of the Witch, in 1917's The Babes in the Woods, which starred Francis Carpenter and Virginia Lee Corbin as Hansel and Gretel. Over the course of his career he would appear in over 100 films, mostly in unnamed, un-credited roles.Some of the more notable films in which he appeared include: in the featured role of Ludwig in 1935's Bride of Frankenstein, starring Boris Karloff; the 1937 version of The Prince and the Pauper, Errol Flynn, Claude Rains, and Billy and Bobby Mauch; Stagecoach (1939), starring John Wayne and Claire Trevor; Mrs. Miniver (1942), starring Greer Garson and Walter Pidgeon; the Bob Hope comedy, The Princess and the Pirate; and the 1947 classic comedy, The Secret Life of Walter Mitty, starring Danny Kaye and Virginia Mayo.His final screen appearance was in a small, unnamed role in Otto Preminger's Forever Amber, starring Linda Darnell and Cornel Wilde; the film was released in October 1947, three months after Billings' death on July 5, 1947. Ted_Billings ( April_7 , 1880 – July_5_,_1947 ) was an_American_character_actor of the_silent_and_sound_film_eras . Born in London , England on April_7 , 1880 , Billings made his_film_debut in the_role of the_Witch , in 1917 's The_Babes in the_Woods , which starred Francis_Carpenter and Virginia_Lee_Corbin as Hansel_and_Gretel . Over the_course of his_career he would_appear in over_100_films , mostly in unnamed_,_un-credited_roles.Some of the_more_notable_films in which he appeared_include : in the_featured_role of Ludwig in 1935 's_Bride of Frankenstein , starring Boris_Karloff ; the_1937_version of The_Prince and the_Pauper , Errol_Flynn , Claude_Rains , and Billy and Bobby_Mauch ; Stagecoach_(_1939_) , starring John_Wayne and Claire_Trevor ; Mrs._Miniver_(_1942_) , starring Greer_Garson_and_Walter_Pidgeon ; the_Bob_Hope_comedy , The_Princess and the_Pirate ; and the_1947_classic_comedy , The_Secret_Life of Walter_Mitty , starring Danny_Kaye and Virginia_Mayo.His_final_screen_appearance was in a_small_,_unnamed_role in Otto_Preminger 's_Forever_Amber , starring Linda_Darnell and Cornel_Wilde ; the_film was_released in October_1947_,_three_months after Billings '_death on July_5_,_1947 .
